name: Guess the Anime Character and Anime Song
name_original: Guess the Anime Character and Anime Song
description:
It is a simple interactive game made with App Lab, a type of project on the game engine, Code Studio. 

A geek game that consists of two sections - guessing the character and guessing the song. The type of 'geek' would be the anime theme that is evident throughout the game.

This game is specifically created as a mobile application therefore, game experience would be more enjoyable on mobile devices however it is playable on PC as well. Below are sample screenshots of how the game would look like on PC and mobile.

For a better PC experience, please download the game via the link below rather than playing it on itch.io.
